pullRequest.body:
Prove the corners theorem and Roth's theorem as corollaries of the triangle removal lemma

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9328045334/job/25678715111)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9328045334/job/25678715163)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9328045334/job/25678715277)

Everything looks good on the maths side - Roth's theorem is one of the central results of additive combinatorics,so it would be good to get this merged and into mathlib, provided people are happy with the Lean code.

Everything looks good on the maths side - Roth's theorem is one of the central results of additive combinatorics,so it would be good to get this merged and into mathlib, provided people are happy with the Lean code.

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion IsCornerFree A ‚Üî ‚àÄ ‚¶Éx‚ÇÅ‚¶Ñ, x‚ÇÅ ‚àà s ‚Üí ‚àÄ ‚¶Éy‚ÇÅ‚¶Ñ, y‚ÇÅ ‚àà s ‚Üí ‚àÄ ‚¶Éx‚ÇÇ‚¶Ñ, x‚ÇÇ ‚àà s ‚Üí ‚àÄ ‚¶Éy‚ÇÇ‚¶Ñ, y‚ÇÇ ‚àà s ‚Üí ```

There is an issue with the theorem as currently formulated that the `n‚ÇÄ` could depend on the universe (although obvisouly it doesn't). This is a general issue of theorems with an existential. There are two options here: either just formulate the theorem with `‚åä(triangleRemovalBound (Œµ / 9) * 27)‚Åª¬π‚åã‚Çä + 1 ‚â§ card G`, or have a definition `def cornersTheoremBound (\epsilon) := ‚åä(triangleRemovalBound (Œµ / 9) * 27)‚Åª¬π‚åã‚Çä + 1` and state the theorem with `cornersTheoremBound (\epsilon) ‚â§ card G`. I think I prefer the latter option.

You can then formulate the next theorems with `cornersTheoremBound (\epsilon / 9)` and `cornersTheoremBound (\epsilon)` and `cornersTheoremBound (\epsilon / 3)`.

Good observation. I hadn't noticed this subtle dependency on the universe but instinctively went with the "global constant" approach until that point where I noticed I would need several constants across the different theorems.

I will ungive up.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: Corners theorem, Roth's theorem

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: Corners, corner-free sets
